TopicTitle: Loading Realism Overhaul on 1.2.2, Game crashes

Articles.Content:
Hello again everyone,

Thank you for taking the time to help me! I decided to abandon my 58 mods to install RSS/RO for a challenge a couple of hours ago. Even after downloading the bare minimum required (and of course the recommended by CKAN) from ckan, The game crashes when the loading bar says ModuleManager:FINAL. Can anyone tell me what I'm doing wrong/how to rectify this issue? 

Thanks a ton,

Liu

Here is the output log: https://www.dropbox.com/s/hxr4cjnihzhk5p1/output_log.txt?dl=0
